title: [Mountain Path]
description: The high walls of this twisting canyon keep this area bathed in a deep and constant shadow.  A narrow crevice in the north wall appears to lead out to brighter ground while a little used trail follows along the rubble strewn floor of this secret pass.

The high walls of this twisting canyon plunge the area into almost total darkness.  A narrow crevice in the north wall appears to lead out to moonlit ground while a little used trail follows along the rubble strewn floor of this secret pass.
